fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • Mundill Mahil was given a six-year jail sentence in 2012, not three years as an article said (Council mayor-elect withdraws over wife’s criminal past, 16 January, page 8). • We printed the wrong credit for an image of composer Erland Cooper. The photograph was by Emily Dennison, not Alex Kozobolis (‘If it moves me to tears, I’ve achieved what I wanted’, 9 January, page 11, G2). In the online version, a photograph of the composer by Alex Kozobolis, was wrongly credited to Emily Dennison. • Other recently corrected articles include: Only a third of US Catholics think priests are honest or ethical UK passport drops to sixth in global power index Sir Peter Swinnerton-Dyer obituary
